column1: Kata Robata////After my last experience here
column2: I must have experienced a completely different restaurant than everyone else.  Service was mediocre at best
column3: and much closer to poor than anything.  After being seated
column4: we were not greeted for over ten minutes by anyone.  Plenty of servers walking around us and looking at us
column5: but not one coming by to say anything nor to even state that our server was a bit busy but would be coming soon.  At nearly fifteen minutes
column7: asks us what we wanted to start with
column8: and leaves for the next ten minutes without bringing us anything.  No water
column10: nothing.  He really didn't give any effort
column11: but that's just because he didn't care.
